2015230.effect:
Cannot be Special Summoned. During the End Phase of the turn this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up: Return it to the hand. To Tribute Summon this card face-up, in addition to your Normal Summon/Set, you can Tribute a Field Spell, Continuous Spell, or Pendulum Spell Card you control, instead of a monster. You can Tribute 1 Pendulum monster you control, then target 1 card you control; While that face-up card is on the field the first time a card or effect activated from the hand would resolve, your opponent must activate 1 of the following effects.
● Your opponent excavates the top 3 cards of their Deck, then adds 1 of those excavated cards to their hand and shuffles the rest into their Deck.
● Your opponent draws 2 cards.
If this card is in your face-up Extra Deck: You can shuffle 1 card from your hand into the Deck; add this card to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Princess Kaguya" once per turn.
2015230.name: Princess Kaguya
2015230.pendulum_effect: If you Pendulum Summon while this card is in your Pendulum Zone and you have "Tamamo-no-Mae" in your other Pendulum Zone: Draw 1 card.

2015207.effect:
Cannot be Special Summoned. During the End Phase of the turn this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up: Return it to the hand. To Tribute Summon this card face-up, in addition to your Normal Summon/Set, you can Tribute a Field Spell, Continuous Spell, or Pendulum Spell Card you control, instead of a monster. You can Tribute 1 Pendulum monster you control, then target 1 card your opponent controls; Your opponent must activate 1 of the following effects. 
● Return that card to your hand, and if you do, shuffle 1 card from your hand to the Deck this End Phase.
● Set that card facedown (if it is face-up) and it cannot be flipped up nor be be destroyed by card effects.
If this card is in your face-up Extra Deck: You can shuffle 1 card from your hand into the Deck; add this card to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Tamamo-no-Mae" once per turn.
2015207.name: Tamamo-no-Mae
2015207.pendulum_effect: If you Pendulum Summon while this card is in your Pendulum Zone: Return 1 card from your hand to your Deck.

2015603.effect:
2 Effect monsters, including a DARK or LIGHT Pendulum monster
(This card is always also treated as a Dark monster). If you control a Pendulum Spirit monster in your Pendulum Zone: Place 1 Pendulum Spirit monster directly from your Deck in your other Pendulum Zone. If this card is destroyed by battle or your opponent's card effect: Your opponent must discard 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Rosmontis, the Divination" once per turn.
2015603.name: Rosmontis, the Divination

2015623.effect:
2 Effect monsters, including a DARK or LIGHT Pendulum monster
(This card is also always treated as a LIGHT monster). You can Special Summon 1 Pendulum Spirit monster from your hand, ignoring its Summoning Conditions. If this card is destroyed by battle or your opponent's card effect: Draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Sinarious, the Assumption" once per turn.
2015623.name: Sinarious, the Assumption

2018789.effect: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Trapod Automated Token" (Machine/DARK/Level 4/ATK 1800/DEF 1000). You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate this effect, except "Trapod" monsters. You can only use this effect of "Automating Trapod" once per turn.
2018789.name: Automated Trapod

2018795.effect: Send 1 Spell/Trap you control to the GY, except "Trapod Anchord"; Special Summon this card as a Normal Monster (Machine/DARK/ Level 4/ ATK 1000/ DEF 1000). (This card is NOT treated as a Trap). If this card is sent to the GY: You can target 1 Trap in your GY, except "Trapod Anchord", and 1 Spell/Trap on the field; banish that target in the GY, and if you do, destroy that target on the field. You can only use each effect of "Trapod Anchord" once per turn.
2018795.name: Trapod Anchord

2018804.effect: Send 1 Spell/Trap you control to the GY, except "Trapod Heatseeker", then target 1 Special Summoned monster your opponent controls; destroy it. If this card is sent to the GY: You can banish 1 "Trapod" Trap from your GY, except "Trapod Heatseeker"; Special Summon this card as a Normal Monster (Level 4/DARK/Machine/ATK 1800/DEF 1000). If Summoned this way, shuffle it into the Deck if it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Trapod Heat Seeker" once per turn.
2018804.name: Trapod Heatseeker

2018762.effect:
1 non-Link "Trapod" monster
You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you Special Summon this card, except "Trapod" monsters. "Trapod" monsters in the same column as a monster your opponent controls can attack your opponent directly. While this card is co-linked, it can attack twice during each Battle Phase. If a "Trapod" monster you control inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can Set 1 of your banished "Trapod" Traps to your field. You can only use this effect of "Marching Trapod" once per turn.
2018762.name: Marching Trapod

2018774.effect:
1 non-Link "Trapod" monster
You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you Special Summon this card, except "Trapod" monsters. While this card is co-linked, it cannot be targeted for attacks, also it gains 800 ATK. During the Main Phase: You can pay 800 LP, then discard 1 card; Set 1 "Trapod" Spell/Trap directly from your Deck to your field. This is a Quick Effect while it is co-linked. You can only use this effect of "Transmitting Trapod" once per turn.
2018774.name: Transmitting Trapod

2018780.effect:
2 "Trapod" monsters with different names
You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you Summon this card, except DARK Machine monsters. You can activate "Trapod" Traps the turn they are Set. During your Main Phase: You can target 1 "Trapod" Trap in your GY; Set it to your field. You can only use this effect of "Activating Trapod" once per turn.
2018780.name: Activating Trapod

2027709.effect: While this card is in your hand or GY: You can Tribute 1 WATER Insect monster you control; Special Summon this card. If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower WATER monster in your GY; Special Summon that monster. and if you do, you can either increase or decrease this cards Level by 1. You can only use each effect of "Fishin' Fish" once per turn.
2027709.name: Fishin' Fish

2027658.effect: If you control only WATER monsters you can Special Summon this card (from your GY). You can only Special Summon "Fishin' Worm" once per turn this way. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 Level 4 or lower "Fishin'" monster from your Deck to the GY, but you cannot Special Summon Fish monsters from the Deck for the rest of this turn. You can only use this effect of "Fishin' Worm" once per turn.
2027658.name: Fishin' Worm

2036098.effect: While you control a "Fishin'" monster you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "Fishin' Lure" once per turn this way. If this card you control is sent to the GY: You can target 1 face-up monster; equip this card to that monster, and if you do, switch the ATK and DEF of that monster. Any "Fishin'" monster equipped with this card gains 500 ATK/DEF. You can only use each effect of "Fishin' Lure" once per turn.
2036098.name: Fishin' Lure

2037799.effect:
You can only control 1 "Great Fishin' Rod". A "Fishin' Fisherman" monster equipped with this card gains this effect.

● During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; equip that monster to this card, then that monster gains 200 ATK/DEF (max. 1).
2037799.name: Great Fishin' Rod

2027744.effect: When a monster declares an attack while you control a WATER Synchro monster: Target the attacking monster; negate the attack, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its ATK. If a "Fishin'" Synchro Monster is destroyed by battle or an opponents card effect while this card is in your GY: You can add this card to your hand. You can only activate each effect of " Fishin' Bait and Switch" once per turn.
2027744.name: Fishin' Bait and Switch

2029468.effect: Reveal 1 "Fishin'" Synchro Monster from your Extra Deck; At the start of your next Main Phase 1, send 2 "Fishin'" monsters from your Deck to the GY, and if you do, destroy this card, then Synchro Summon the "Fishin'" Synchro Monster revealed by this effect from your Extra Deck whose level is equal to that of the sent monsters, but you can only Special Summon WATER monsters from the Extra Deck the turn this effect is activated. You can only activate this effect of "Fishin' Day Catch!" once per turn.
2029468.name: Fishin' Day Catch!

2037389.effect: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Fishin" card from your Deck to your hand. While you control "Fishin' Fisherman": You can Special Summon 1 "Worm Token" (Insect/WATER/Level 2/ATK 0/DEF 0), but that token cannot be used to Special Summon a monster from the Extra Deck. You can only activate each effect of "Great Fishin' Market" once per turn.
2037389.name: Great Fishin' Market

2027727.effect:
1+ Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
This card cannot be targeted by your opponents card effects while you control a Fish Synchro Monster. If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can add 1 "Fishin'" Spell/Trap. from your Deck to your hand. During your Main Phase: You can target 1 WATER monster or "Fishin'" card in your GY; equip that target to this card, and if you do, this card gains DEF equal to half the ATK of the equipped monster. You can only use each effect of "Fishin' Fisherman" once per turn.
2027727.name: Fishin' Fisherman

2036113.effect:
1+ Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
Once per turn: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy it, and if you do, this card gains 200 DEF. While this card is in your GY: You can Tribute 1 WATER Insect monster you control; Special Summon this card. You can only activate this effect of "Great Fishin' Big Bass" once per turn.
2036113.name: Great Fishin' Big Bass

2033188.effect:
1+ Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
At the start of the Damage Step while you control "Fishin Fisherman", if this card battles an opponent's monster: You can banish that monster, and if you do, banish this card until your next Standby Phase. While this card is in your GY: You can Tribute 1 WATER Insect monster you control; Special Summon this card. You can only use each effect of "Great Fishin' Barracuda once per turn.
2033188.name: Great Fishin' Barracuda

2029487.effect:
1+ Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
Once per turn: You can target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; banish it, and if you do, this card gains 200 ATK. While this card is in your GY: You can Tribute 1 WATER Insect monster you control; Special Summon this card. You can only activate each effect of "Great Fishin' Swordfish" once per turn.
2029487.name: Great Fishin' Swordfish

If this card is banished by the effect of an "Ananta" card: You can Special Summon this card, and if you do, it's original ATK and DEF become 1500. You cannot Summon monsters the turn you activate either of this card's effects, except "Ananta" monsters. You can only use each effect of "Ananta's Servant, Medusa" once per turn.

1757506.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned, you can discard 1 "Ananta" card; add 1 "Ananta's Mirror" from your Deck to your hand. If this card is banished by the effect of an "Ananta" card: You can Special Summon this card, and if you do, it's orgianl ATK and DEF become 1500. You cannot Summon monsters the turn you activate either of this card's effects, except "Ananta" monsters. You can only use each effect of "Ananta's Servant, Euryale" once per turn.
1757506.name: Ananta's Servant, Euryale

If this card is banished by the effect of an "Ananta" card: You can Special Summon this card, and if you do, it's orgianl ATK and DEF become 1500. 1757515.name: Ananta's Servant, Stheno

1757540.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned, you can target 1 "Ananta" monster in your GY; Special Summon it. If this card is banished by the effect of an "Ananta" card: You can Special Summon this card, and if you do, it's original ATK and DEF become 1500. You cannot Summon monsters the turn you activate either of this card's effects, except "Ananta" monsters. You can only use each effect of "Manifestation of Ananta, Apophis" once per turn.
1757540.name: Manifestation of Ananta, Apophis

1757544.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned, you can reveal 1 "Ananta" monster from your hand; Special Summon it, and if you do, you can gain 500 LP. If this card is banished by the effect of an "Ananta" card: You can Special Summon this card, and if you do, it's original ATK and DEF become 1500. You cannot Summon monsters the turn you activate either of this card's effects, except "Ananta" monsters. You can only use each effect of "Manifestation of Ananta, Apep" once per turn.
1757544.name: Manifestation of Ananta, Apep

1757553.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned, you can discard 1 "Ananta" card: Special Summon Level 4 or lower "Ananta" monster from your Deck. If this card is banished by the effect of an "Ananta" card: You can Special Summon this card, and if you do, it's original ATK and DEF become 1500. You cannot Summon monsters the turn you activate either of this card's effects, except "Ananta" monsters. You can only use each effect of "Manifestation of Ananta, Vritra" once per turn.
1757553.name: Manifestation of Ananta, Vritra

1757567.effect:
If you control an "Ananta" monster, you can activate this card from your hand. Banish 1 "Ananta" card from your hand, then apply 1 of the following effects:
● Add up to 2 "Ananta" monsters from your Deck to your hand, then discard 1 card.
● Special Summon 1 "Ananta" monster from your hand or GY.
If this card is in your GY, and you control "Evil Dragon Ananta", you can banish this card from your GY; send 1 "Ananta" monster from your Deck to your GY. You can only activate 1 "Ananta's Manifestation" per turn.
1757567.name: Ananta's Manifestation

1757573.effect: If you control an "Ananta" monster, you can activate this card from your hand. Banish 1 "Ananta" card from your hand: Fusion Summon 1 "Ananta" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by banishing Fusion Materials listed on it from your hand, field, or GY. If you would use "Evil Dragon Ananta" as Fusion Material, you can send that monster to the GY, instead of banishing it. If this card is in your GY, and you control an "Ananta" monster, you can banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Evil Dragon" Ananta" from your Deck to your hand, also Special Summon 2 "Sacrifice to Ananta" Tokens (Reptile/DARK/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0). You can only activate this effect of "Ananta's Mirror" once per turn.
1757573.name: Ananta's Mirror

1757579.effect: If you control an "Ananta" monster, you can activate this card from your hand. Banish 1 "Ananta" card from your hand; negate the effects of 1 card your opponent controls. If you control "Evil Dragon Ananta" at this card's activation, you can negate the effects of all cards in this card's column this turn, except "Ananta" cards. If this card is in your GY, and you control an "Ananta" monster, you can banish this card from your GY: Shuffle all "Ananta" cards that are banished or in your GY into the Deck, and if you shuffled 5 or more cards by this effect, you can draw 1 card. You can only activate 1 "Ananta's Temptation" per turn.
1757579.name: Ananta's Temptation

1472.effect: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by removing from play all Reptile-Type monsters from your side of the field and Graveyard. This card's ATK and DEF are each equal to the number of monsters you removed x 600. During each of your End Phases, destroy 1 card on the field.
1472.name: Evil Dragon Ananta

1757556.effect: "Ananta's Servant, Medusa" + 1 "Ananta" monsterUnaffected by monster efffects. If this card is Fusion Summoned, you can target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy it. You can discard 1 "Ananta" card, then target 1 "Ananta" card in your GY; add it to your hand. If this card is banished by the effect of an "Ananta" card: You can Special Summon this card, and if you do, it's original ATK and DEF become 2500. You cannot Summon monsters the turn you activate either of this card's effects, except "Ananta" monsters. You can only use each effect of "Ananta's Disciple, Medusa" once per turn.
1757556.name: Ananta's Disciple, Medusa

1757559.effect: "Ananta's Servant, Euryale" + 1 "Ananta" monsterUnaffected by Spell efffects. If this card is Fusion Summoned, you can target 1 face-up Spell your opponent controls; destroy it. You can discard 1 "Ananta" card, then target 1 card on the field; negate it's effects. If this card is banished by the effect of an "Ananta" card: You can Special Summon this card, and if you do, it's original ATK and DEF become 2500. 1757559.name: Ananta's Disciple, Euryale

1757563.effect: "Ananta's Servant, Stheno" + 1 "Ananta" monsterUnaffected by Trap efffects. If this card is Fusion Summoned, you can target 1 face-up Trap your opponent controls; destroy it. You can discard 1 "Ananta" card, then target 1 banished "Ananta" Trap; add it to your hand. If this card is banished by the effect of an "Ananta" card: You can Special Summon this card, and if you do, it's original ATK and DEF become 2500. You cannot Summon monsters the turn you activate either of this card's effects, except "Ananta" monsters. You can only use each effect of "Ananta's Disciple, Stheno" once per turn.
1757563.name: Ananta's Disciple, Stheno

1933687.effect: You cannot Summon monsters, except "Bleakstory" monsters. Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned with the effect of a "Bleakstory" card. If all monsters you control are "Bleakstory" monsters with different Types/Attributes (min. 2): You can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. You can only use this effect of "Bleakstory Cerulean Chainer" once per turn. Up to twice per turn, when a "Bleakstory" card(s) is banished from your field or GY: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it.
1933687.name: Bleakstory Cerulean Chainer

1843535.effect: You cannot Summon monsters, except "Bleakstory" monsters. Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned with the effect of a "Bleakstory" card. If all monsters you control are "Bleakstory" monsters with different Types/Attributes (min. 2): You can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. You can banish 1 monster from your GY; inflict 800 damage to your opponent, then, if your opponent's LP is less than 4000, you can draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Bleakstory Ruthless Royalty" once per turn.

1843540.effect: You cannot Summon monsters, except "Bleakstory" monsters. Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned with the effect of a "Bleakstory" card. If all monsters you control are "Bleakstory" monsters with different Types/Attributes (min. 2): You can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. If a "Bleakstory" monster you control destroys a monster by battle: You can shuffle 1 of your banished "Bleakstory" cards into the Deck; that monster can make a second attack in a row. You can only use each effect of "Bleakstory Defiant Damsel" once per turn.

You can only use this effect of "Bleakstory Graceless Girl" once per turn.
1933670.name: Bleakstory Graceless Girl

You can only use this effect of "Bleakstory Ominous Orphan" once per turn.

You can only use this effect of "Bleakstory Innocent Incandescent" once per turn.

1933860.effect: You cannot Summon monsters, except "Bleakstory" monsters. Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned with the effect of a "Bleakstory" card. 1942979.effect:
1 "Bleakstory" monster
You cannot Summon monsters, except "Bleakstory" monsters. When this card is Link Summoned: Gain LP equal to the original ATK of the monster used as material. 2 "Bleakstory" monsters

1942989.effect:
3+ "Bleakstory" monsters with different Types, including a Link Monster
You cannot Summon monsters, except "Bleakstory" monsters. When this card is Link Summoned: Destroy all cards this card points to. You can only use each effect of "Bleakstory Artistic Architect" once per turn.
1942989.name: Bleakstory Artistic Architect

2022089.effect: If this card is in your hand (Quick Effect): You can target any number of face-up "Charismatic" cards you control; excavate cards from the top of your Deck equal to the number of targets still face-up on the field, then, if you excavated a "Charismatic" card, you can Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, if you excavated only "Charismatic" cards, you can add 1 excavated card to your hand, also, after that, shuffle the rest into the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Jane, Charismatic Counselor" once per turn.
2022089.name: Jane, Charismatic Counselor

1869524.effect: If a "Charismatic" card(s) is sent to your GY: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it. You must control a face-up "Charismatic" card to activate and resolve this effect. You can only use each effect of "Jaren, Charismatic Interpreter" once per turn.
1869524.name: Jaren, Charismatic Interpreter

1869377.effect: When an attack is declared involving an opponent's monster and another LIGHT Spellcaster monster you control: You can send this card from your hand or field to the GY, then target that attacking monster and the attack target; immediately after this effect resolves, Link Summon 1 LIGHT Spellcaster Link Monster, by using only those targets as material. Once while this card is in the GY, during the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can Link Summon 1 LIGHT Spellcaster Link Monster, by using monsters you control as material, including a "Charismatic" monster. You can only use 1 "Johnson, Charismatic Adjudicator" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1869377.name: Johnson, Charismatic Adjudicator

1869509.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can send 1 "Charismatic" card from your Deck to your GY. If this card is sent to the GY as Link Material: You can target 1 "Charismatic" card in your GY, except "Charismatic Philosopher"; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Jones, Charismatic Philosopher" once per turn.
1869509.name: Jones, Charismatic Philosopher

1869356.effect: During your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon 1 "Charismatic Energy Token" (Fairy/LIGHT/Level 5/ATK 1000/DEF 1000), then gain 1000 LP. If this card is in your GY: You can return 1 Link-2 Spellcaster Link Monster from your field or GY to your Extra Deck; Special Summon this card. You can only use each effect of "Jordan, Charismatic Healer" once per turn.
1869356.name: Jordan, Charismatic Healer

2047541.name: Charismatic Devotee

1565558.effect: If you control a Link-2 Spellcaster Link Monster: Target 1 Set card your opponent controls; send it to the GY, then you can Set it to your field. You can only activate 1 "Charismatic Holy Conversion" per turn.
1565558.name: Charismatic Holy Conversion

1870561.effect: Target 1 "Charismatic" Link Monster in your GY; return it to the Extra Deck, then Special Summon from your Extra Deck, 1 "Charismatic" Link Monster with the same Link Rating but a different name. (This is treated as a Link Summon.) If a "Charismatic" card you control would be destroyed or banished by an opponent's card effect, you can banish this card from your GY, instead. You can only use each effect of "Charismatic Holy Recompense" once per turn.
1870561.name: Charismatic Holy Recompense

1869477.effect: "Charismatic" monsters you control gain 500 ATK/DEF. All monsters you control gain 300 ATK/DEF for each "Charismatic" Link Monster you control with a different name. You can discard 1 card; add 1 "Charismatic" card from your Deck to your hand with the same card type (Monster, Spell, or Trap) but a different name. You can only use this effect of "Charismatic Scales of Justice" once per turn. You can only control 1 "Charismatic Scales of Justice".
1869477.name: Charismatic Scales of Justice

1869495.effect: When your opponent activates a monster effect while you control a Link-2 Spellcaster Link Monster: Negate the activation, and if you do, if you control a LIGHT monster, Tribute that opponent's monster. You can only activate 1 "Charismatic Divine Intervention" per turn.
1869495.name: Charismatic Divine Intervention

1869470.effect: If you control no monsters, or if the only monsters you both control and own are "Charismatic" monsters (min. 1): Special Summon 1 "Charismatic" monster from your Deck, also it cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects for the rest of this turn. You can only activate 1 "The Charismatic Divine Book" per turn.
1869470.name: The Charismatic Divine Book

1686388.effect:
2 "Charismatic" monsters, including a non-Link Monster
If this card is in your GY: You can target 1 face-up "Charismatic" card you control; send it to the GY, then Special Summon this card. You can draw cards equal to the number of "Charismatic" card types (Monster, Spell, and Trap) sent from the field to the GY this turn. You can only use each effect of "Charismatic Acolyte" once per turn.
1686388.name: Charismatic Acolyte

1868436.effect:
2 LIGHT Spellcaster monsters, including a "Charismatic" monster
(Quick Effect): You can target 1 LIGHT Spellcaster monster in your GY; Special Summon it, but you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Link-2 Spellcaster Link Monsters. You can only use this effect of "Charismatic Minister" once per turn.
1868436.name: Charismatic Minister

2047540.effect:
1 "Charismatic" monster + 1 monster owned by your opponent
You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except "Charismatic" monsters. During the Main or Battle Phase (Quick Effect): You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; take control of it, but its effects cannot be activated this turn, also, its ATK/DEF becomes 2000/0, and its name becomes "Charismatic Devotee". Shuffle it into the Deck if either it or this card leaves the field. You can only use this effect of "Charismatic Parson" once per turn.
2047540.name: Charismatic Parson

1558753.effect:
2 "Charismatic" monsters
During your opponent's Main Phase, if you control this card in the Extra Monster Zone (Quick Effect): You can look at up to 2 random cards in your opponent's hand, then, you can Special Summon 1 monster from among the revealed cards and your opponent's GY, but its effects are negated. If this card is in the Main Monster Zone: You can target 2 face-down cards on the field; destroy them. You can only use each effect of "Charismatic Priestess" once per turn.
1558753.name: Charismatic Priestess

1986140.effect:
(This card's name is also always treated as "Harpie Lady".)
It's difficult being known as the Harpie who can't fly. It's hard for her to rely on someone else, let alone something that can't even speak for itself. Even so, she's happy that her Pet Dragon is always by her side, whether it wants to be or not.
1986140.name: Channeler and Harpie's Pet
1986140.pendulum_effect: During your Main Phase: You can target 1 "Harpie Lady" in your GY; add it to your hand. During your Standby Phase, you can: Immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon 1 WIND monster. You can only use 1 "Channeler and Harpie's Pet" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

1985923.effect:
(This card's name is always treated as "Harpie Lady".)
Once per Chain, when a Field Spell effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can negate that effect.
1985923.name: Harpie's Lady

1986639.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned, except by a card effect. This card's name becomes "Harpie Lady" while on the field or in the GY. You can only use each of the following effects of "Harpie Gryphon" once per turn. You can target 1 "Harpie Lady" or "Harpie Lady Sisters" you control; return it to the hand, and if you do, immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon this card. If this card is sent to the GY by, or to activate, a card effect: You can add 1 "Harpie" monster or 1 "Hysteric" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand, except "Harpie Gryphon".
1986639.name: Harpie Gryphon

1985821.effect:
(This card's name is always treated as "Harpie Lady Sisters".)
You can reveal this card and 1 other "Harpie" card in your hand; shuffle this card into the Deck, and if you do, add 1 "Harpie" monster from your Deck to your hand with a different name from the revealed cards.
1985821.name: Harpie Lady's Sisters

1986688.effect:
(This card's name is always treated as "Harpie Lady".)
You can discard 1 "Elegant Egotist"; Ritual Summon this card from your hand, by Tributing monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels equal or exceed this card's original Level. (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 Winged Beast monster you control, then target 2 other cards on the field; send them to the GY. You can only use each effect of "Harpie Harmony" once per turn.
1986688.name: Harpie Harmony

1986194.effect:
(This card is always treated as a "Harpie" card.)
If you control a WIND Winged Beast monster: Negate the effects of monsters your opponent currently controls until the End Phase. If you control a "Harpie" monster, you can activate this card from your hand. If this card in its owner's Spell & Trap Zone is destroyed by an opponent's card effect: You can add 1 "Harpie's Feather Duster" from your Deck or GY to your hand.
1986194.name: Gryphon's Calm in Feather's Storm

1986071.effect:
1 non-Fusion "Harpie's Pet" monster + 1 Winged Beast "Harpie" monster
Must first be Fusion Summoned, or Special Summoned by shuffling the above cards you control into the Deck (in which case you do not use "Polymerization"). Unaffected by your opponent's Trap effects. During the Main or Battle Phase (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "Harpie Lady" or "Harpie Lady Sisters" in your GY; Special Summon it. You can only use this effect of "Harpie's Pet Ecstatic Dragon" once per turn.
1986071.name: Harpie's Pet Ecstatic Dragon

1986484.effect:
2 Level 7 monsters
Once per turn, you can also Xyz Summon "A Cast of Harpie Ladies" by using 1 Level 6 "Harpie Lady Sisters" and 1 Level 4 WIND monster you control as material. This card's name(s) becomes the name(s) of all "Harpie" monsters attached to this card as material. Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 face-up monster on each field; return them to the hand. This is a Quick Effect if this card only has "Harpie" monsters as material.
1986484.name: A Cast of Harpie Ladies

1986505.effect:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
For this card's Synchro Summon, you can treat 1 "Harpie" monster you control as a Tuner. Gains 300 ATK/DEF for each "Harpie" monster on the field. Once per turn: You can target 1 WIND monster you control and 1 face-up card your opponent controls; banish them until the start of the next Main Phase. This is a Quick Effect if this card was Synchro Summoned using a "Harpie's Pet" monster as Synchro Material.
1986505.name: Harpie's Pet Prize Dragon

1869639.effect: During your Main Phase: You can make 1 monster your opponent controls be treated as FIRE monster. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Ashen" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Ashen Spirit, Descendant of the Blazing Fire" once per turn. You cannot Summon monsters the turn this card is Summoned, or its effects are activated, except FIRE monsters.
1869639.name: Ashen Spirit, Descendant of the Blazing Fire
1869639.treated_as: Ashen Spirit, Descendant of the Blazing Fire

1877167.effect: If you control an "Ashen" monster, or your opponent controls a FIRE monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, if your opponent controls 2 or less Tokens, Special Summon 1 "Ashen Token" (Pyro/FIRE/Level 3/ATK 2000/DEF 2000) to your opponent's field. During your Main Phase: You can make 1 monster your opponent controls be treated as FIRE monster.If a "Ashen" monster is Synchro Summoned, while this card is in yoir GY: You can Special Summon this card from your GY, but banish it when it leaves the field, then you can Special Summon 1 "Ashen Token" to your opponents side of the field. You can only use this effect of "Ashen Wanderer, Descendant of the Blazing Fog" once per turn. You cannot Summon monsters the turn this card is Summoned, or its effects are activated, except FIRE monsters.
1877167.name: Ashen Wanderer, Descendant of the Blazing Fog
1877167.treated_as: Ashen Wanderer, Descendant of the Blazing Fog

1885911.effect: If you control an "Ashen" monster, or your opponent controls a FIRE monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, if your opponent controls 2 or less Tokens, Special Summon 1 "Ashen Token" (Pyro/FIRE/Level 3/ATK 2000/DEF 2000) to your opponent's field. During your Main Phase: You can make 1 monster your opponent controls be treated as FIRE monster. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned, you can Banish 1 "Ashen" monster from your hand or GY: This cards Level either becomes the banished monsters, or this card gains Levels equal to the banished monster. You can only use each effect of "Ashen Collector, Descendant of the Blazing Spirits" once per turn. You cannot Summon monsters the turn this card is Summoned, or its effects are activated, except FIRE monsters.
1885911.name: Ashen Collector, Descendant of the Blazing Spirits
1885911.treated_as: Ashen Collector, Descendant of the Blazing Spirits

1877068.effect: During your Main Phase: You can make 1 monster your opponent controls be treated as FIRE monster. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned, you can discard 1 card: Excavate the top 5 cards of your Deck: Special Summon 1 excavated "Ashen" monster, but its effects are negated, then shuffle the other 4 excavated cards into the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Ashen Archer, Descendant of the Blazing Bows" once per turn. You cannot Summon monsters the turn this card is Summoned, or its effects are activated, except FIRE monsters.
1877068.name: Ashen Archer, Descendant of the Blazing Bows
1877068.treated_as: Ashen Archer, Descendant of the Blazing Bows

1885906.effect: If you control an "Ashen" monster, or your opponent controls a FIRE monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, if your opponent controls 2 or less Tokens, Special Summon 1 "Ashen Token" (Pyro/FIRE/Level 3/ATK 2000/DEF 2000) to your opponent's field. During your Main Phase: You can make 1 monster your opponent controls be treated as FIRE monster. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Ashen" card from your GY to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Ashen Slicer, Descendant of the Blazing Swords" once per turn. You cannot Summon monsters the turn this card is Summoned, or its effects are activated, except FIRE monsters.
1885906.name: Ashen Slicer, Descendant of the Blazing Swords
1885906.treated_as: Ashen Slicer, Descendant of the Blazing Swords

1869686.effect: If you control an "Ashen" monster, or your opponent controls a FIRE monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, if your opponent controls 2 or less Tokens, Special Summon 1 "Ashen Token" (Pyro/FIRE/Level 3/ATK 2000/DEF 2000) to your opponent's field. During your Main Phase: You can make 1 monster your opponent controls be treated as FIRE monster. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Ashen" monster from your hand or GY. You can only use each effect of "Ashen Ghoul, Descendant of the Blazing Shadows" once per turn. You cannot Summon monsters the turn this card is Summoned, or its effects are activated, except FIRE monsters.
1869686.name: Ashen Ghoul, Descendant of the Blazing Shadows
1869686.treated_as: Ashen Ghoul, Descendant of the Blazing Shadows

1885956.effect: All "Ashen" monsters you control gain 300 ATK. If your opponent controls 3 or more FIRE monsters, you can look at your opponents Extra Deck and banish 1 monster in it. If an "Ashen" monster leaves your field because of your opponents card or effect, you can pay 1000 LP: Add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Ashen Devastation" once per turn.
1885956.name: Ashen Devastation

1879007.effect: If this card is activated: You can add 1 "Ashen" monster from your Deck to your hand. If your opponent Special Summons a monster, you can target that monster; it becomes treated as a FIRE Attribute monster. If an "Ashen" monster is Synchro Summoned, while your opponent controls a FIRE Normal monster, you can target 1 monster your opponent controls: It loses 1000 ATK. You can only use each effect of "Ashen Temple of The Burning Descendants" once per turn. You cannot Summon monsters the turn this card is activated, except FIRE monsters.
1879007.name: Ashen Temple of The Burning Descendants
1879007.treated_as: Ashen Temple of The Burning Descendants

1885938.effect: Equip to a monster your opponent controls. It loses 500 ATK, it cannot activate its effects and its name becomes "Ashen Pawn". If the equipped monster is sent to the GY, the owner of this card can Special Summon 1 "Ashen" monster from their GY. You can only activate 1 "Assault of the Ashen Spirits" per turn.
1885938.name: Assault of the Ashen Spirits

1879056.effect:
1 "Ashen" Tuner monster + 1+non-Tuner monsters
If this card is Synchro Summoned, you can target 1 Level 4 or lower "Ashen" monster in your GY: Special Summon it, buts its effects are negated. Once per Chain, during your opponent's Main Phase, you can (Quick Effect): Immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon using this card you control. A "Ashen" monster Synchro Summoned by this effect can activate 1 of its effects as a Quick Effect. You can only use each effect of "Ashen Goliath, Descendant of the Blazing Giants" once per turn.
1879056.name: Ashen Goliath, Descendant of the Blazing Giants
1879056.treated_as: Ashen Goliath, Descendant of the Blazing Giants

1877145.effect:
1 "Ashen" Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
(Quick Effect) You can Special Summon 1 "Ashen Token" (Pyro/FIRE/Level 3/ATK 2000/DEF 2000) to your opponents side of the field, then make 1 monster your opponent controls be treated as a FIRE attribute monster. This monster gains the following effects based on the number of FIRE Attribute monsters on the field:
●2+: You can destroy 1 FIRE Normal Monster on the field, then target 1 monster on the field: Destroy it.
●4+: The first time this card would be destroyed by card effect per turn, it is not.
●6+: During the Battle Phase, if this card declares an attack on an opponents monster: You can banish that monster, and if you do, this card can make a second attack during the Battle Phase this turn, and if it does, it gains 100 ATK for each FIRE monster on the field.
You can only use each effect of "Ashen Phoenix, Descendant of the Blazing Inferno" once per turn.
1877145.name: Ashen Phoenix, Descendant of the Blazing Inferno
1877145.treated_as: Ashen Phoenix, Descendant of the Blazing Inferno

1862987.effect:
1 "Ashen" Tuner monster + 1+ non-Tuner monsters.
(Quick Effect) If your opponent controls 2 or less Tokens, Special Summon 1 "Ashen Token" (Pyro/FIRE/Level 3/ATK 2000/DEF 2000) to your opponent's field, then you can make 1 monster your opponent controls be treated as a FIRE attribute monster. This monster gains the following effects based on the number of FIRE Attribute monsters on the field:
●2+: You can target 1 card on the field: Banish it
●4+: Cannot be targeted by card effects.
●6+: FIRE monsters you control inflict double battle damage, and inflict piercing battle damage.
●8+: You can send all other face-up cards on the field to the GY, and if you do, your opponent takes no battle damage for the rest of the turn.
You can only use each effect of "Ashen Dragon, Descendant of the Blazing Star" once per turn.
1862987.name: Ashen Dragon, Descendant of the Blazing Star
1862987.treated_as: Ashen Dragon, Descendant of the Blazing Star

1885922.effect:
2 "Ashen" monsters
If an "Ashen" monster is Synchro Summoned to a zone this card points to, and all monsters this card points to are FIRE Attribute, you can target 1 card on the field: Destroy it. If a FIRE Attribute monster is Special Summoned to your opponents side of the field to a zone this card points to; You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Ashen" monster from your hand or GY. You can only use each effect of "Ashen Paladin" Descendant of the Blazing Front Lines" once per turn.
1885922.name: Ashen Paladin, Descendant of the Blazing Front Lines
1885922.treated_as: Ashen Paladin, Descendant of the Blazing Front Lines

1879100.effect:
3+ "Ashen" monsters
Synchro monsters can be treated as 2 Link Materials for the Link Summon of this card. You can target as many monsters your opponent controls, up to the amount of monsters that this card points to, apply these effects in sequence:
●Banish those monsters
●Monsters your opponent controls that point to this card become treated as FIRE Attribute monsters.
● Special Summon 1 "Ashen" Synchro Monster from your GY to a zone this card points to, but until the end of the turn, its effects are negated, and it cannot attack, then take 1000 damage.
You can only use each effect of "Ashen Reaper, Descendant of the Blazing Scythe" once per turn.
1879100.name: Ashen Reaper, Descendant of the Blazing Scythe
1879100.treated_as: Ashen Reaper, Descendant of the Blazing Scythe

2028988.effect: You cannot Special Summon Monsters from the Extra Deck, except "Battleseer", Level 6 and 9 Synchro Monsters. If you control no monsters, or all monsters you control are "Battleseer" monsters: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can only use this effect of "Battleseer of Beasts, Felicia" once per turn. A "Battleseer" Synchro or Link Monster that used this card as Material can attack all monsters your opponent controls, once each, also when it attacks, your opponent's cards and effects cannot be activated until the end of the Damage Step.
2028988.name: Battleseer of Beasts, Felicia

2028974.effect: You cannot Special Summon Monsters from the Extra Deck, except "Battleseer", Level 6 and 9 Synchro Monsters. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: If there are no cards in this cards column, you can target 1 monster on the field; You can Special Summon 1 "Battleseer" monster from your Deck but it has its effects negated, then return that target to the hand (if any). If this card is sent from the field to the GY for the Link or Synchro Summon of a "Battleseer" monster: You can target 1 monster on the field; change its battle position. You can only use each effect of "Battleseer of Crystals, Elmenhilde" once per turn.
2028974.name: Battleseer of Crystals, Elmenhilde

2028828.effect: You cannot Special Summon Monsters from the Extra Deck, except "Battleseer", Level 6 and 9 Synchro Monsters. Cannot attack unless all monsters you control are "Battleseer" monsters. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Battleseer" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand, then if there are no other cards in this cards column, you can Special Summon 1 "Battleseer" monster from your hand. If this card is sent from the field to the GY for the Link or Synchro Summon of a "Battleseer" monster: You can target 1 of your opponent's unused Main Monster Zones; until your next Standby Phase, that Zone cannot be used. You can only use each effect of "Battleseer of Giants, Rein" once per turn.
2028828.name: Battleseer of Giants, Rein

2028934.effect: You cannot Special Summon Monsters from the Extra Deck, except "Battleseer", Level 6 and 9 Synchro Monsters. If there are no cards in a column, you can Special Summon this card to that column (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "Battleseer of Lunars, Jean" once per turn this way. If this card is sent from the field to the GY for the Link or Synchro Summon of a "Battleseer" monster: You can send 1 "Battleseer" card from your Deck to the GY. You can only use this effect of "Battleseer of Lunars, Jean" once per turn.
2028934.name: Battleseer of Lunars, Jean

2028851.effect: You cannot Special Summon Monsters from the Extra Deck, except "Battleseer", Level 6 and 9 Synchro Monsters. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: If there are no cards in this cards column, you can target 1 monster in your opponent's GY; You can discard 1 "Battleseer" card, then draw 1 card, then banish that target from the GY (if any).. If this card is sent from the field to the GY for the Link or Synchro Summon of a "Battleseer" monster: You can target 1 other "Battleseer" card in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Battleseer of Thunders, Ivan" once per turn.
2028851.name: Battleseer of Thunders, Ivan

2028847.effect: You cannot Special Summon Monsters from the Extra Deck, except "Battleseer", Level 6 and 9 Synchro Monsters. If there are no cards in a column, you can Special Summon this card to that column (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "Battleseer of Undeads, Ile" once per turn this way. If this card is sent from the field to the GY for the Link or Synchro Summon of a "Battleseer" monster: You can Special Summon this card to a column with no cards in it, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use this effect of "Battleseer of Undeads, Ile" once per turn.
2028847.name: Battleseer of Undeads, Ile

2028967.effect: The first time each "Battleseer" monster you control would be destroyed by card effect each turn, it is not destroyed. You can target 1 "Battleseer" Synchro or Link Monster you control; return it to the Extra Deck, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Battleseer" monster from your GY. You cannot activate this effect the turn you activate this card. If this card is destroyed by an opponent's card effect: You can shuffle this card into the Deck. You can only activate 1 "Battleseer Battleground" per turn.
2028967.name: Battleseer Battleground

2028883.effect: Add 1 "Battleseer" monster from your Deck to your hand, then if there are no cards in this cards column, you can increase the Level of 1 "Battleseer" monster you control by 3. If a "Battleseer" Link or Synchro Monster is Special Summoned while this card is in your GY; You can add this card from your GY to your hand. You can only use 1 "Battleseer Infinity Charge" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
2028883.name: Battleseer Infinity Charge

2028902.effect: Equip only to a "Battleseer" monster. While there are no cards in its column, it cannot be targeted by your opponent's card effects, also your opponent can only target it for attacks. If this card is sent to the GY, while equipped to a monster: You can target 1 "Battleseer" monster you control; equip this card to that target. You can only control 1 "Battleseer's Hope".
2028902.name: Battleseer's Hope

2028925.effect: When your opponent activates a card or effect that targets a card(s) you control while you control a Level 9 or Link 3 "Battleseer" monster: You can negate the activation, then if there are no cards in that cards column, you can shuffle it into the Deck. During your Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the GY, if this card is in the GY: You can shuffle it into the Deck, and if you do, draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Battleseer Thundering Wave" once per turn.
2028925.name: Battleseer Thundering Wave

1991982.effect:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
All cards in this cards column cannot be targeted by your opponents card effects. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 monster on the field; move it to another Main Monster Zone. If a monster is moved to another Main Monster Zone: You can target 1 card in an adjacent Column to this card; return it to the hand. You can only control 1 "Noble People, Arc Angel".
1991982.name: Noble People, Arc Angel

2023404.effect:
2 Level 7 monsters
The first your opponent takes effect damage each turn, inflict 300 damage to your opponent. If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can target up to 2 cards in your opponent's GY; shuffle them into the Deck, and if you do, inflict 600 damage to your opponent for each card shuffled into the Deck by this effect. (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 Material from this card, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; inflict 600 damage to your opponent, and if you do, change it face-down Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Lancer of Red, Karna" once per turn.
2023404.name: Lancer of Red, Karna

2028874.effect:
1 "Battleseer" Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
For this cards Synchro Summon you can treat "Battleseer" Link Monsters as Level 3 monsters. You cannot Special Summon Monsters, except "Battleseer", Level 6 and 9 Synchro Monsters. If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can target 1 "Battleseer" monster in your GY; banish it, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Battleseer" monster from your Deck with a different name, then if there are no cards in this cards column, you can banish the top 3 cards of your opponent's Deck, face-down. During your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 monster in your opponent's GY; Special Summon it to your field in face-down Defense Position to a column with no cards in it. You can only use each effect of "Battleseer of Amours, Glyle" once per turn.
2028874.name: Battleseer of Amours, Glyle

2028954.effect:
1 "Battleseer" Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
For this cards Synchro Summon you can treat "Battleseer" Link Monsters as Level 3 monsters. All monsters your opponent controls lose 100 ATK for every "Battleseer" card in your GY with a different name. If this card is Synchro Summoned: During the End Phase, you can Special Summon 1 "Battleseer" monster from your GY. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; return it to the hand. You can only use each effect of "Battleseer of Celestials, Jean" once per turn.
2028954.name: Battleseer of Celestials, Jean

2028894.effect:
1 "Battleseer" Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
For this cards Synchro Summon you can treat "Battleseer" Link Monsters as Level 3 monsters. If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can have both players draw 1 card and reveal it; Special Summon the monster revealed with the highest ATK to its owner's field in Attack Position. (If no monsters are revealed send both cards to the GY). When your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can reduce this cards Level by 3, and if you do, negate that effect, then if that card was activated in a column with no cards, you can Set it to your field. You can only use each effect of "Battleseer of Destruction, Igor" once per turn.
2028894.name: Battleseer of Destruction, Igor

2028943.effect:
1 "Battleseer" Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
For this cards Synchro Summon you can treat "Battleseer" Link Monsters as Level 3 monsters. You cannot Special Summon Monsters, except "Battleseer", Level 6 and 9 Synchro Monsters. If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can target 1 "Battleseer" Spell/Trap in your GY; Set it to your field, then if there are no cards in this cards column, you can destroy 1 card your opponent controls. If this card is sent from the field to the GY for the Link or Synchro Summon of a "Battleseer" monster: You can look at 1 random card in your opponent's hand, then you can place that card on bottom of your opponent's Deck, and if you do, your opponent draws 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Battleseer of Solars, Jean" once per turn.
2028943.name: Battleseer of Solars, Jean

2028839.effect:
1 non-Link "Battleseer" monster
You cannot Special Summon Monsters from the Extra Deck, except "Battleseer", Level 6 and 9 Synchro Monsters. If this card is Link Summoned: You can gain 300 LP for every "Battleseer" monster you currently control, then if there are no other cards in this cards column, you can look at the top card of your opponent's Deck, and if you do, place that card on either the top or bottom of their Deck. If this card is sent from the field to the GY for the Link or Synchro Summon of a "Battleseer" monster: You can target 1 monster you control; it cannot be targeted by your opponent's card effects, until your next End Phase. You can only use each effect of "Battleseer of Feathers, Medra" once per turn.
2028839.name: Battleseer of Feathers, Medra

2028912.effect:
2+ "Battleseer" monsters
If this card is Link Summoned: You can banish 3 "Battleseer" monsters from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Battleseer" Synchro Monster from your Extra Deck, then if there are no cards in this cards column, this turn, monsters this card points to gain 1000 ATK. You can target 1 monster you control; send it to the GY, and if you do, Special Summon 1 of your banished "Battleseer" monsters to your Zone this card points to. You can only use each effect of "Battleseer of Royals, Medra" once per turn.
2028912.name: Battleseer of Royals, Medra

1940943.effect:
Once per turn, if an opponent's monster is destroyed by battle, you can gain 500 LP for each Tribute Summoned monster you control. You can only use 1 of the following "Deus Ex Force" effects per turn, and only once that turn.
● If this card is Summoned from the hand, or your opponent Special Summons a monster(s) from the Extra Deck: You can Special Summon 1 "Deus Ex" monster from your Deck, except "Deus Ex" Force.
● During your Main Phase or your opponent's End Phase: You can send cards from the top of your Deck to the GY, up to the number of "Deus Ex" cards you control, and if you do, draw up to 1 card for each "Deus Ex" card sent to the GY this way (max. 2).
1940943.name: Deus Ex Force

1940889.effect: If this card is in your hand or GY: You can discard 2 cards, including a "Deus Ex" card, and if you do, Special Summon this card. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "Deus Ex" Normal Spell/Trap in your GY; apply that target's effect, then shuffle that target into the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Deus Ex Fortress" once per turn.
1940889.name: Deus Ex Fortress

1940912.effect:
If a "Deus Ex" monster you control battles while you control this Tribute Summoned card, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects until the end of the Damage Step. You can only use 1 of the following "Deus Ex Hydra" effects per turn, and only once that turn.
● At the end of the Damage Step, if this card attacked: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it, then you can add 1 card from your GY to your hand with the same original card type (Monster, Spell, Trap) as the destroyed card.
● (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "Deus Ex" Normal Spell/Trap in your GY; apply that target's effect, then shuffle that target into the Deck.
1940912.name: Deus Ex Hydra

1940933.effect:
If a "Deus Ex" monster you control attacks a Defense Position monster while you control this Tribute Summoned card, inflict piercing battle damage. You can only use 1 of the following "Deus Ex Reactor" effects per turn, and only once that turn.
● If a "Deus Ex" card(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can discard this card instead.
● When your opponent activates a card or effect that targets a "Deus Ex" card(s) you contro (Quick Effect): You can pay 1000 LP; send 1 "Deus Ex" card with the same original card type as that opponent's card (Monster, Spell, or Trap) from your Deck to the GY.
1940933.name: Deus Ex Reactor

1940978.effect: Tribute any number of Machine monsters from your hand or field that have Levels, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Deus Ex" monster from your hand or Deck, whose Level is less that or equal to the total original Levels of the Tributed monsters +1. You can only activate 1 "Deus Ex Ascension" per turn.
1940978.name: Deus Ex Ascension

1940957.effect: Both players can Normal Summon "Deus Ex" monsters for 1 less Tribute. If your opponent activates a Field Spell: Destroy this card. If this face-up card in your Field Zone is destroyed: You can Special Summon 1 "Deus Ex" monster from your hand, Deck, or GY, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Deus Ex" monsters. You can only use this effect of "Deus Ex Geartown" once per turn.
1940957.name: Deus Ex Geartown

1941050.effect: Activate this card by targeting 1 "Deus Ex" monster in your GY; Special Summon it, and if you do, equip this card to that target. The equipped monster can be treated as 2 Tributes for a Tribute Summon, also it can make a second attack on monsters during each Battle Phase. You can only activate 1 "Deus Ex Revival" per turn.
1941050.name: Deus Ex Revival

1940970.effect: Add 1 "Deus Ex" card from your Deck or GY to your hand, except "Deus Ex Revolution". You can only activate 1 "Deus Ex Revolution" per turn.
1940970.name: Deus Ex Revolution

1940984.effect: Destroy 1 face-up "Deus Ex" card you control, except "Deus Ex War", then you can destroy 1 card your opponent controls. You can only activate 1 "Deus Ex War" per turn.
1940984.name: Deus Ex War

1940992.effect: Destroy 1 "Deus Ex" card from your hand or face-up field, except "Deus Ex Clash", and if you do, negate the effects of 1 face-up card on the field until the End Phase. You can only activate 1 "Deus Ex Clash" per turn.
1940992.name: Deus Ex Clash

1941014.effect: Banish cards from either GY, up to the number of EARTH Machine monsters you control, and if you do, "Deus Ex" monsters you currently control gain 300 ATK for each card banished by this effect, until the end of this turn. You can only activate 1 "Deus Ex Machina" per turn.
1941014.name: Deus Ex Machina

2029366.effect:
2 monsters
During the End Phase, if you control this Link Summoned card: You can activate 1 of the following effects. You can only use this effect of "Deus Ex Connector" once per turn.
● Send 1 "Deus Ex" card from your Deck to the GY.
● Special Summon 1 "Deus Ex" monster from your hand.
2029366.name: Deus Ex Connector
